column2: There are things I like about these and things I don't. Pros: They take up very little space and make a lot of ice cubes. The ice cubes are easy to get out of the trays. Cons: The ice cubes take forever to freeze. Since they are silicone and very flexible, it is hard to get the trays from the sink to the freezer without spilling (even with the lids on). I like them and will keep using them, but my husband really doesn't care for them.
It's a fast charger but it doesn't charge the phone as fast as my plug in. It's nice but a fast cord charger is better.
Perfect Christmas gift for my sister! She loved them. The bands are very difficult to change!
I have long, fine hair. These are hard to put in & pull my hair when I take them out.
Not very powerful. Noisy.
Beautiful shoes but rhinestone fall off. Found two and replaced them with glue but have lost some permanently. Still like the shoes.

It’s very hard to get the handle to lock in you need somebody strong to help you. I can’t get the handle down at all to put it in the car so The handle has to stay up. I’m almost 4 weeks in and it’s not as comfortable as it was in the beginning so the comfort level goes down really fast. Now I am 5 foot 3 1/2. For somebody taller this might be fine for comfort level but for anybody under my height you need to get a kid size. But the cushion also wears down fast under weight I am close to 200 pounds. Losing weight though I’m off my feet because I don’t wanna get any bigger! I am now five weeks into using this scooter and the handle has popped off three times. None of these scooters with this type of wheel or any good on anything but flooring In a house. I tried to use it on a brick paved sidewalk and almost fell face first. Also twigs and small rocks can stop you in your path and turn you over if you’re not careful. Luckily my balances OK so none of that happened but I came close to it more than a dozen times. Again this is for in-home use only but the handle falls off after a few weeks so I would maybe buy something else
Did not charge my psp well at all
Seems to be working for my older dog. The vet recommended this brand.

Love these. Bought a total of 4 now. Over time they seem not to stand up like they did brand new, but still like them. Easy to carry up and down stairs, durable, and fit more than a full load of laundry.
Its perfect for my purpose, its lite weight is perfect, and so soft and warm. I stopped using an electric blanket because this one is so much more comfortable.
Some of the designs are hard to recognize.
This was never received...
Stitching came undone immediately. Already took tags off so couldn't return. Disappointed.
The USB was configured incorrectly to fit into my 2016 Hyundai Sonata. When I turned it over so that the USB would connect, the audio connector was on the wrong side. Won't work at all!
Have not received over a month ago I ordered this
Elena Ferrante is a genius. These books transport you to Naples. One can't help but to fall in love with Elena and Lila.
Great prices and props for my photo booth company.
Nice color. My cabinet looks like new.
Fits great and has been very durable. I have dropped my phone numerous times and have had no damage to my phone.
